Caption: Figure 13. Combination of SSAO and our technique. Left to right: only SSAO, only global illumination, combined approach. The bottom line shows indirect lighting buffer.
Mention:
Thus, since the secondary occlusion is not taken into account during the propagation phase, SSAO is used 
as a multiplicative factor during light propagation volume rendering (see Figure 13. Combination of SSAO 
and our technique. Left to right: only SSAO, only global illumination, combined approach. The bottom 
line shows indirect lighting buffer.).
